title: The Wondrous World of Whimsical Willy
description: Before scandal broke on set, every day was a wondrous, fundrous, wonderful, funderful day. Join Whimsical Willy and his pals Miss Happy Flower, Maid Mary, Kitty the Elephant, Duke Monday, Dynamite Dog, and Crazy Horse.
quote: There’s only one thing that can cure a sadness cloud… and that’s happy paper.
altHero: Whimsical Willy, a mustached man wearing suspenders, a bowtie, and a tiny top hat, reads a book of wondrous tales
alt1: a flying mushroom crosses a rainbow near a smiling sun over a fantasy land
alt2: a man in a purple elephant costume speaks with a blond woman in a maid’s uniform
alt4: Whimsical Willy with giant, pleading eyes holds up a hundred dollar bill
